Texts.Eng: A telescope that's been rusted away by seafoam.
Texts.Chs: 被海泡石腐蚀掉的望远镜。

Texts.Eng: Clearly this telescope hasn't been maintained. I can't see a thing out of it!
Texts.Chs: 很明显，这台望远镜没有得到维护。我什么也看不出来！

Texts.Eng: Floran likes the glass of rusty telescope.
Texts.Chs: 叶族人喜欢生锈的望远镜。

Texts.Eng: How'd these pirates get so far with a telescope this broken?
Texts.Chs: 这些海盗怎么能带着这台坏的望远镜走这么远？

Texts.Eng: I don't think anybody'll be usin' this thing any time soon.
Texts.Chs: 我不认为很快会有人用这个东西。

Texts.Eng: Improper storage has destroyed this instrument, perhaps beyond repair.
Texts.Chs: 存储不当损坏了这台仪器，可能无法修复。

Texts.Eng: The glass of this telescope is too clouded to even see through anymore.
Texts.Chs: 这台望远镜的玻璃太浑浊了，看不透了。

Texts.Eng: This telescope is rusting badly in several places.
Texts.Chs: 这台望远镜在好几个地方严重生锈。
